flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=188>>188 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 188 = <<1/8*188=47/2>>47/2 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 47/2 x 3 = <<47/2*3=141/2>>141/2 pounds.
He now weighs 188 - 141/2 = <<188-141/2=235/2>>235/2 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 235/2 = <<156-235/2=77/2>>77/2 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.
#### 77/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 188. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
